title: WHY YASUO IS STILL BROKEN???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
body: Literally every fucking game its a Max mastery Yasuo player because they cant win by playing the game normally so they choose a guy with 2 broken shields, infinite mobility and a stupid ult that can be proc'd by every fucking spell in imaginable. Also turns out they are cancerous players who would have guessed? A GAME SHOULD NOT BE DOWN TO WHOEVER HAS YASUO OR A BETTER YASUO

replies.body:
Hey guys, don't worry, autistic nerds that practice a video game 12+ hours a day can counter Yasou with teamwork... so why cant you?

The fact is balance at lower ELOs matters too... and Yasuo still just has too much shit to work with.
He is broken and at Gold Elo and below (90% of all players)  he is basically permabanned and that tells you there is something wrong with him.

http://lolalytics.com/champion/Yasuo/
Yasuo has a win rate 49.45% for Platinum+ players whilst the very best Yasuo's are earning a win rate of 56.18% with the average rank of these top players being in Diamond I.

LoLalytics ranks Yasuo at 68 amongst all champions earning a tier grade of Gold.

This ranking takes into account the win rate of Platinum+ players, the pick/ban influence of Yasuo, the win rate and average rank of the best Yasuo players.

it seems he is pretty balanced via win rate being a 49.45%.... he is a highly mechanical/skill based champ... you get better the more you play with him and against him... 

can he snowball incredibly hard ? YES 

does he have what would be consider an over loaded kit? YEA

is he unbeatable? NO 

is he broken? NOPE

No offense, but nobody cares about Plat+. That's about 10% of the players so they are an irrelevant minority. What matters is how he does in Gold and below elo. He reks people there on a very very consistent basis. Bring relevant facts (that don't include a tiny 10% of the players) or get lost.

plat plus is what the game is balanced around ... 

you wanna see it for your elo ? 



yasuo has a win rate of 51.49% 

at lower elos people have issues vs these champs cuz of the complexity of their kits and dont know how to work together as a team to kill them ... and they snowball harder... but in higher elos such as plat plus where the game is balanced around where supposedly the "skilled " players are you know that top 10%  they have lower win rates cuz players are smarter and better and know how to play around these champs

NO OFFENSE since you dont

oh and by the way 51.49% win rate isnt BROKEN just cuz he isnt picked/ban dont mean you win if you pick him or lose if the other team does

Look at his ban rates. He has overall highest ban rates in the game - at any ELO (have to add top and mid yasuo bans).
http://champion.gg/statistics/?league=platplus#?sortBy=general.banRate&order=descend

low elos ban him cuz they cant play around him or know how to handle him

but whatever u wanna say ... sure {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The link I cited shows he's even the most banned in Plat+ elo. So ya I, what's your point exactly?

and the link i PROVIDED shows all stats for all tiers 

whats your point ?

Politely mate but on champion gg he is only the top ban in Bronze and silver. Drops down to 3rd in gold and is 4th in plat and 7th in Plat+. 

Takeing a look at winrates for all champions.
Bronze. #20 as top, #44 in mid.
Silver. #26 top, # 83 mid.
Gold. # 37 top. #125 mid.
Plat. #81 top. # 128 mid.
Plat  + # 79 top. # 135 mid.
 
Lets look at this with a bit more detail. I'm going to now check his position placments and also look for how many champions have a 5% gap in win rates vs him. Also worth a mention, from Bronze to gold he is played as a mid more often then top, plat and plat + we see him top more then mid.

Bronze. As a top. 2/46 best win rate in role, 53.38% but it takes till champion at 41/54 to hit a 5% gap. He is 8/54 for kills, 53/54 for deaths ( 2nd highest deaths as a top might be a better way to word this). 50/54 for assists, 2/54 for cs and 3/54 for gold generated. His damage to champs puts him at 14/54  and his damage taken is  45/54 (this is a positive imo, as hes not a tank so soaking damage is not his job.)

Going off win rates he is not the problem that people make him out to be, but he is an excessively annoying champion if your main has a bad matchup.  I really think it would be more constructive if folks would stop complaining that he is op and/or Broken and just focus in on the fact he is unfun to play vs and excessively frustrating in numerous bad matchups.
Pretty sure Zac is banned more in high elo...

Dont ask in this forum. There are 3 outcomes:
1: You are bronze
2: you are a noob or bronze
3: you are a noob and not bronze.

I recommend never going into this forum for league questions, better go on reddit or search google.

you are probably just mad because you cant play around with yasuo like for real tho people like you are the worst. All you need is ONE CHAMPION with point and click stun for example: Leona q, and once you hit that well he will just get target and will just get burst down "Focus the adc" people always say that but when they have a yasuo focus him first than the adc "2 broken shield" you said ok first the passive shield: all you need is a range auto proc it and kill him I don't know there the second shield come from is it from the ult reset or BT? "infinite mobility" you said well he cant dash around if you freeze the lane right outside tower range in lane since if he dash he will go into and tower and will probably just die. ELO Problems.

He is not broken at all, just really annoying to lane against.
HE IS NOT BROKEN ANYMORE! GOLLY!!! I HATE PEOPLE WHO JUST BAN HIM AND THINK HES  BROKEN
GOLLY INDEED FRIENDO!

yasuo isnt broken.i honestly enjoy when yasuo is on enemy team cause it means free gold for our team.just dont feed him early and play safe cause thats when hes super strong.his midgame is super trash and you can easy gank and dive him over and over.honestly every yasuo who plays vs me dies atleast 10 times.just learn to play vs him instead complain.people like you are reason game is so unbalanced and champs that dont deserve nerf get nerfed

Yasuo isnt strong early. Just levels 1 and 2. 

People often make the mistake of letting yasuo poke/trade/harass before they have all of their skills. Yasuo's mid game is pretty bad unless he snowballs hard early, which really shouldn't happen. His late game is slightly worse (damage wise) than any other marksman because of the reduced crit, but his utility and in fight mobility make up for it, so his late game is pretty decent as long as he isnt #1 diving into a team fight.

EDIT: I also love how people like to talk about how OP his defensive abilities are. How long has Yasuo been #1 or #2 for worst KDA and most deaths per game? All elos too...

"Its just bad players bringing his numbers down"

So Yasuo takes skill?

"Yasuo is a brain dead champion, who can EZ carry 1v9"

ummm... what?

Lets face it, his defenses are laughable at best.
